Params: Flaming red hair dances in the night like a bursting flame, flickering in the wind.
This burning hellscape is the perfect battlefield for Cerberus.
The Corrupted do not seem to want to tangle with the three of them, however, sprinting toward different directions like a stream evading unyielding rocks.
No. 21 ably tears the Corrupted before her into two before leaping onto the roof of a wooden house.
9 o'clock. Enemies are advancing toward the residents' hideout.
And... another group of enemies are doubling back on the other side.
Only now does Vera notice a group of Corrupted heading toward Cerberus' car after No. 21 points it out.
The signage standing in the middle of the town finally crumples in the flame, separating Vera from Noctis and No. 21.
You two go protect the humans!
I'll take care of the other side.
It's normal to have no humans in the no man's land, right?
I'm going to put that on the mission report. Who am I going to ask for direction if they're all dead? You?!
No. 21 flips and jumps down the roof, and the two figures gradually disappear behind the fire.
Vera immediately throws her banner spear in the other direction, clearing a path to their car.
What the hell... Why would anyone be interested in a broken car?!
